newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia rubber market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia rubber market closed for holiday.

text.p: Malaysia's rubber market is closed on Thursday for a Moslem holiday.
On Wednesday, the August buyer price for the RSS1 was 234 Malaysia/Singapore cents (91 U.S. cents), up three cents from Tuesday. The SMR20 for August buyer stood at 236 cents, up 1.50 cents.

Traders quoted the SMR20 at 243/244 cents, the SMR10 at 242, SMR5 at 249, SMR CV at 296, SMR L at 278, and drum latex at 194. They said there were hardly reports of trade on Wednesday, with buyers remaining wary of a weak ringgit.
